price: Nítorí náà, A mú àwọn tó jẹ́ onígbàgbọ́ òdodo jáde kúrò nínú (ìlú náà).
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā mina al-mu'minīna
